ddf.catalog.transform

Interface InputTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfluenceInputTransformer, CswRecordConverter, GeoJsonInputTransformer, GmdTransformer, InputTransformerConsumer, InputTransformerStub, PdfInputTransformer, PptxInputTransformer, RegistryTransformer, TikaInputTransformer, VideoInputTransformer, XmlInputTransformer, XmlInputTransformer

    public interface InputTransformer
    An InputTransformer has the purpose of creating a Metacard from a given InputStream. Alternatively a Metacard implementation's constructor can be used to create Metacards.

    Implementations of this interface must:

    • Register with the OSGi Service Registry using the InputTransformer interface
    • Include a Service property with name "id" (Constants.SERVICE_ID) and a String value uniquely identifying the particular implementation
    Author:
    ddf.isgs@lmco.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metacard transform(InputStream input)
      Transforms the input into a Metacard.
      Metacard transform(InputStream input, String id)
      Transforms the input into a Metacard and associates the id with the Metacard on creation.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        Metacard transform(InputStream input)
            throws IOException,
                   CatalogTransformerException
        Transforms the input into a Metacard.
        Parameters:
        input - the binary InputStream to transform
        Returns:
        the generated Metacard
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs when reading the InputStream
        CatalogTransformerException - if an error occurs during transformation

      • transform

        Metacard transform(InputStream input,
                   String id)
            throws IOException,
                   CatalogTransformerException
        Transforms the input into a Metacard and associates the id with the Metacard on creation.
        Parameters:
        input - the binary InputStream to transform
        id - the attribute value for the Metacard.ID attribute that should be set in the generated Metacard
        Returns:
        the generated Metacard
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs when reading the InputStream
        CatalogTransformerException - if an error occurs during transformation
